Synopsis: One of a series of twelve short dance films designed specifically for television.

Man starts tap-dancing imitating the noise of the ponyâ€™s hoofs. Lies down to sleep. Sounds of blacksmith. Man tapping. Pony shaking its chained head. Stableman arrives and takes it away, leaving man shut in. Credits.
Title: Dance House 7
